projects.title: Peter Wei Portfolio
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js, React, and ShadCN UI, featuring a chat interface and CV content.

projects.title: Data Wiki Page
projects.description: A dynamic data wiki page with Next.js, React, ShadCN UI, integrated with a .NET backend using Azure DevOps and Agile.

projects.title: Payroll System
projects.description: A payroll system managing 1,500+ projects, leveraging React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Axios, MongoDB, and Nest.js to streamline payroll data processing and generate accurate PDFs.

projects.title: Dribag Coffee Co. Website
projects.description: Led Shopify development and SEO strategy, securing corporate clients, and generating 30K+ social media views.

projects.title: AxCharge Website
projects.description: Developed and launched the official website for a start-up team of 4, increasing user engagement by 30% through innovative UI/UX design.

projects.title: Rotary Club Website
projects.description: Redesigned and updated the Rotary Club of Brisbane's website, enhancing content accessibility and user engagement by 25%.
